net.jodah.failsafe

Class AsyncFailsafeConfig<R,F>

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.jodah.failsafe.FailsafeConfig<R,F>
      • net.jodah.failsafe.AsyncFailsafeConfig<R,F>
  • Type Parameters:
    R - result type
    F - failsafe type - SyncFailsafe or AsyncFailsafe
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AsyncFailsafe

    public class AsyncFailsafeConfig<R,F>
extends FailsafeConfig<R,F>
    Async Failsafe configuration.

    Async execution event listeners are called asynchronously on the Scheduler or ScheduledExecutorService associated with the Failsafe call.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      F onAbortAsync(CheckedBiConsumer<? extends R,? extends Throwable> listener)
      Registers the listener to be called asynchronously on Failsafe's configured executor or Scheduler when an execution is aborted according to the retry policy.

      Registers the listener to be called asynchronously on Failsafe's configured executor or Scheduler when an execution is aborted according to the retry policy.
